title: Teresa Carles
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Raw, Mediterranean, Salad bar, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Bakery, European, Spanish
description: Family-owned establishment that's part of a small network of vegetarian restaurants; this one opened Jan 2016. Offers breakfast, brunch, dinner, and takeaway. There is a salad bar and a 3-course weekly changing menu options which usually includes at least 1 vegan option. Has smoothies and cold press juices. Busy, pleasant atmosphere and modern decor with plenty of seating. Replaced Restaurant Paradis.
